FR: Add an employee using three attributes (employee ID employee hire date and employee assignment)
The Employee task assignment attribute on the input record is validated against the logical task assignment file managed in another application
User can also search and view detailed employee information
An annual report is produced listing the employees with statistics
The user can delete an employee in this case a notification is sent to the administrator to validate the operation
The administrator can display the different user requests and accept / validate or refuse them
